title: Are the servers down right now?
body: Recently joined a ranked game. Crashed a loading, now I can't log on. Just keep getting 'cant connect to pvp.net'  Tried rebooting my modem/pc/the usual troubleshooting procedure...

replies.body:
I can feel those {{item:3070}}'s 

If I lose LP though ima be needing  {{item:3124}}
It's happening to a LOT of people right now from what I can tell, including myself.
i have no idea, but this is happening to me right now too{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
